Service Details: - Offers a drop-in group for seniors that provides opportunities to build friendships and play board games- A healthy soup and sandwich are available at noon for a small cost- Regularly features musical groups and soloists from across the Kelowna area, many who are also senior adults- Offers educational or information workshops of interest to senior adults on some Wednesdays- Special programs or worship services are offered at Thanksgiving, Christmas, Valentine’s and Easter- The Salvation Army makes every effort to keep connected with and care for Drop-In attenders who become sick or shut-in with phone calls, e-mails or personal visits to homes and hospitals and also regularly visit past members who are no longer able to attend due to ill health
